title: Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Madison, Wisconsin
content:
Photo submitted by Steve Kotajarvi, “Well it’s mid December now and we still do not have any snow in Madison, WI. Here’s a little detour I take sometimes off the capital city trail.” We always love seeing photos from where you are riding and are happy to share them with our readers around the world here

The post Bikerumor Pic Of The Day: Madison, Wisconsin appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Kristi Benedict
